[Portrait]Flower Peddler
[Dialog]A flower for a gil, ser?{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]A flower?{END}

Yes, a flower-a blossomed bud.
You've seen one, I'm sure.{END}

Of course I have!{END}

Well, then, surely you could
spare a gil for one of mine.
They're quite pretty.{END}

[lista]1. I've no need of flowers.
2. A gil seems a fair price.[finelista][chiudi]I'm afraid I've no need

I see. Good day to you, then.{END}

Was I wrong to say no?{END}

A gil seems a fair price.{END}

Then you'll buy one? Truly?
Oh, thank you, kind ser!{END}

Few stop these days, and even
fewer buy. It is a harder life than
you might know.
I always dream some charming
knight will come galloping through
and sweep me away from all this.{END}

Beg pardons, ser. I know there's
naught that you can do.

I thank you again! May that
flower bring you good fortune.{END}

These times are hard
for all.{END}
